presentationTable.name: Facts - Analytics Currency
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics

presentationColumns.name: # of Quotes
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.# of Quotes

presentationColumns.name: # of Expired Quotes
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Expired Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.# of Expired Quotes

presentationColumns.name: # of Unique Quotes
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Unique Quotes (based on External Quote number, ignores Quotes versions and treats Quotes with same Quote id as one)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.# of Unique Quotes

presentationColumns.name: # of Active Quotes
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.# of Active Quotes

presentationColumns.name: # of Won Active Quotes
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Active Quotes Won
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.# of Won Active Quotes

presentationColumns.name: # of Lost Active Quotes
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Active Quotes Lost
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.# of Lost Active Quotes

presentationColumns.name: # of In-Progress Active Quotes
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Active In-Progress Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.# of In-Progress Active Quotes

presentationColumns.name: # of Closed Active Quotes
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Active Quotes Closed (Won+Lost)
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.# of Closed Active Quotes

presentationColumns.name: Active Quote Win Rate
presentationColumns.description: The rate of winning Active Quotes. This metric is computed as follows:  # of Won Quotes/# of Closed Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Active Quote Win Rate

presentationColumns.name: Active Quote Loss Rate
presentationColumns.description: The rate of losing Active Quotes. This metric is computed as follows: # of Lost Quotes/# of Closed Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Active Quote Loss Rate

presentationColumns.name: Active Quote Conversion Rate
presentationColumns.description: The rate of converting the Active Quotes. This metric is computed as follows: # of Closed Quotes/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Active Quote Conversion Rate

presentationColumns.name: # of Active Quotes with Proposal
presentationColumns.description: The total number of Active Quotes with Proposal
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.# of Active Quotes with Proposal

presentationColumns.name: Average Active Quote Cycle Time
presentationColumns.description: The average Quote Cycle Time. This metric is computed as follows:  (Quote Order Placed on Date - Quote Creation Date)/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average Active Quote Cycle Time

presentationColumns.name: Average Opportunity to Current Active Quote Time
presentationColumns.description: The average time between Opportunity and Quote creation date. This metric is computed as follows:  (Quote Creation Date - Opportunity Creation Date)/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average Opportunity to Current Active Quote Time

localization.localizationKey: Average Opportunity to Current Active Quote Time

presentationColumns.name: Active Quote To Won Opportunity Time
presentationColumns.description: The average time between Won Opportunity Close Date and Quote creation date. This metric is computed as follows:  (Opportunity Close Date - Quote Creation Date)/# of Active Quotes for Won Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Active Quote To Won Opportunity Time

localization.localizationKey: Active Quote To Won Opportunity Time

presentationColumns.name: Active Quote To Lost Opportunity Time
presentationColumns.description: The average time between Lost Opportunity Close Date and Quote creation date. This metric is computed as follows: (Opportunity Close Date - Quote Creation Date)/# of Active Quotes for Lost Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Active Quote To Lost Opportunity Time

localization.localizationKey: Active Quote To Lost Opportunity Time

presentationColumns.name: Active Quote to Contract Start Time
presentationColumns.description: The time to start the Contract after the Quote is created. This metric is computed as follows:  (Contract Start Date - Quote Creation Date)/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Active Quote to Contract Start Time

localization.localizationKey: Active Quote to Contract Start Time

presentationColumns.name: Average Length of Contract (Active Quotes)
presentationColumns.description: The average Length of the Contract. This metric is computed as follows:  (Contract End Date - Contract Start Date)/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average Length of Contract (Active Quotes)

presentationColumns.name: Average Number of Active Quote Iterations
presentationColumns.description: The average number of Quotes created per Active Quote. This metric is computed as follows: # of Quotes/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average Number of Active Quote Iterations

localization.localizationKey: Average Number of Active Quote Iterations

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Quotes for Open Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The average number of Quotes for Open Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: # of Quotes/# of Open Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average # of Quotes for Open Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Average # of Quotes for Open Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Quotes for Won Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The average number of Quotes for Won Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: # of Quotes/# of Won Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average # of Quotes for Won Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Average # of Quotes for Won Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Quotes for Lost Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The average number of Quotes for Lost Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: # of Quotes/# of Lost Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average # of Quotes for Lost Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Average # of Quotes for Lost Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Quotes for No-Sale Opportunities
presentationColumns.description: The average number of Quotes for No Sale Opportunities. This metric is computed as follows: # of Quotes/# of No-Sale Opportunities
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average # of Quotes for No-Sale Opportunities

localization.localizationKey: Average # of Quotes for No-Sale Opportunities

presentationColumns.name: Contract Value (Active Quotes)
presentationColumns.description: The total Quote Contract value in Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Contract Value in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Average Contract Value (Active Quotes)
presentationColumns.description: The average Contract value per Active Quote. This metric is computed as follows:  Total Contract Value/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average Contract Value (ACV) in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Recurring Revenue Amount (Active Quotes)
presentationColumns.description: The total Recurring Revenue Amount from Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Recurring Revenue Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Average Recurring Revenue (Active Quotes)
presentationColumns.description: The average Recurring Revenue Amount from Active Quotes. This metric is computed as follows: Total Recurring Revenue Amount/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average Recurring Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Non-Recurring Revenue Amount (Active Quotes)
presentationColumns.description: The total Non-Recurring Revenue Amount from Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Non Recurring Revenue Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Average Non-Recurring Revenue (Active Quotes)
presentationColumns.description: The average Non-Recurring Revenue Amount from Active Quotes. This metric is computed as follows: Total Non-Recurring Revenue Amount/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average Non Recurring Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Usage Revenue Amount (Active Quotes)
presentationColumns.description: The total Usage Revenue Amount from Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Usage Revenue Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Average Usage Revenue (Active Quotes)
presentationColumns.description: The average Usage Revenue Amount from Active Quotes. This metric is computed as follows: Total Usage Revenue Amount/# of Active Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Average Usage Revenue in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Raw Quote Contract Value
presentationColumns.description: The total Quote Contract value in all Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics

presentationColumns.description: The total Recurring Revenue Amount from all Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Raw Recurring Revenue Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.description: The total Non-Recurring Revenue Amount from all Quotes
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales CPQ Integrated Analytics
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Quote.Raw Non Recurring Revenue Amount in Analytics Currency
